item.description:
The third race, informally speaking, of our 2012 TMIRCE racing season is a flat and fast USATF-certified 5K hosted by our friends, the Somerville Road Runners. It is the first race of the New England Pub Series, organized by New England Runner magazine, and it draws hundreds of entrants. There is plenty of post-race food and drink, with an awards ceremony and party at the Asgard pub in Central Square. It's a great choice for your first 5K race, and you'll get a sense of the wide variety of local running clubs as folks show up in their team uniforms. Easy online registration hosted by RaceMenu - just fill in "TMIRCE" under running club.

http://www.racemenu.c... http://www.facebook.c...

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: TMIRCE Race Series: An Ras Mor 5K, 3-25-12
